title: Medicine Ball Chest Pass Against Wall

items: Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Hold a medicine ball at chest level with both hands.
Extend your arms and forcefully throw the ball at the wall.
Catch the ball as it bounces back towards you.
Repeat for desired number of repetitions.
Improves upper body strength and power
Targets chest, shoulders, and triceps
Increases explosiveness and speed
Enhances hand-eye coordination and reaction time
Can be done alone or with a partner for added challenge
Low impact exercise that is easy on the joints
Chest muscles (pectoralis major and minor)
Shoulder muscles (deltoids)
Triceps
Core muscles (abdominals and obliques)
